tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: new
tag.description: Not based on anything, the story is a new work, usually made up by the people involved in creating the anime. Generally if an original work (原作) credit is given, it will be to the studio, or director, or other members of the production team.

character.name: C no Shihaisha Gear God VII

episode.title: 最強の魔王竜! その名はバッツ!!
The Most Powerful Demon Lord Dragon! His Name is Batzz!
Saikyou no Maou Ryuu! Sono Na wa Batzz!!
episode.summary: A mysterious new dragon appears before Gao, inviting him to participate in a Buddyfight tournament that pits the parallel worlds against each other. Gao and his friends travel to Dragon World to find a Buddy that will be his partner. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: バッツ地球へ! 超東驚大パニック!!
Batzz Goes to Earth! Major Panic in Cho-Tokyo!
Batzz Chikyuu e! Chou Higashi Odoroki Dai Panic!!
episode.summary: To Chibi Panda and Gao`s dismay, Batzz shows no interest in the World Buddy Masters. Worse still, his rampages cause city-wide blackouts. Chibi Panda learns the rules of Buddyfight, while Gaito and Abygale challenge Gao and Batzz to a match. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Ending
Opening
ノーダメージファイター! 大宇宙カナタ!!
No-Damage Fighter, Kanata Ozora!
No Damage Fighter! Dai Uchuu Kanata!!
episode.summary: Gao discovers that soccer star Kanata is also a Buddyfight genius who has never lost a life point. Tasuku tries to convince Kanata to represent Star Dragon World in the World Buddy Masters, but Kanata is no longer interested in Buddyfight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ワールドバディマスターズ開幕!!
The World Buddy Masters Begins!
World Buddy Masters Kaimaku!!
episode.summary: The World Buddy Masters tournament begins, with ten worlds represented by ten skilled Buddyfighters. Gao`s first match is against Magic World representative Tetsuya, but his real challenge is learning to deal with Batzz`s rebellious streak. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: トラになれ! ノボル, 最後のファイト!!
Become a Tiger! Noboru`s Final Fight!
Tora ni Nare! Noboru, Saigo no Fight!!
episode.summary: Noboru meets his next opponent, a young boy who claims to be Noboru`s biggest fan. Batzz suspects that there is more to Sakate than meets the eye. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最強戦艦サツキ発進! 攻撃目標はバッツ!!
Strongest Battleship Satsuki Launches! Attack Target: Batzz!
Saikyou Senkan Satsuki Hasshin! Kougeki Mokuhyou wa Batzz!!
episode.summary: Gao`s next opponent is Kuu Teito, a Buddy Police trainee representing Hero World. Ku is determined to prove that her Buddy, Satsuki, is the strongest monster of all. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ガイトか!? 海道か!? 迫る死の宣告!!
Gaito is...? Kaido is...? The Death Sentence Approaches!
Gaito ka!? Kaidou ka!? Semarushi no Senkoku!!
episode.summary: Batzz quits the tournament, but Dai Kaido does his best to convince him to stay. Gaito decides to use a mysterious new Impact in his next match. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 恐怖の奇襲! バッツ絶体絶命!!
Terrifying Ambush! Batzz`s Back Against the Wall!
Kyoufu no Kishuu! Batzz Zettaizetsumei!!
episode.summary: Gao and his friends try to come up with a strategy to defeat Sakate`s powerful Ambush technique. Zanya uncovers the truth about Sakate and his boss. Meanwhile, Sakate is back to his old tricks, playing mind games and trying to recruit Batzz. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ガイトVSカナタ! 運命の必殺シュート!!
Gaito versus Kanata! Impact Shoot of Destiny!
Gaito s Kanata! Unmei no Hissatsu Shoot!!
episode.summary: Gao and Batzz have a fight and Gao takes drastic measures to keep Batzz in line. Gaito and Kanata are both determined to be the one who will face Gao in the final round, but Kanata finds his confidence wavering. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決勝戦! ワールドナンバー1は誰だ!!
Final Round! Who is the World Number One?
Kesshousen! World Number 1 wa Dare Da!!
episode.summary: Gao and Kanata face off in the final round of the World Buddy Masters. Baku has prepared a special deck to counter the No-Damage Fighter, but Kanata has some unexpected tricks up his sleeve. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 死闘決着! ミラージュカード降臨!!
The Desperate Battle Concludes! The Mirage Card Manifests!
Shitou Kecchaku! Mirage Card Kourin!!
episode.summary: The final match of the World Buddy Masters continues, as Gao deals damage to Kanata and defends his life points. When Kanata uses his new card to survive a winning blow, the tournament`s outcome hinges on his final turn. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: C[カオス]の支配者! ギアゴッドVII!!
Ruler of Chaos! Geargod VII!
Chaos no Shihaisha! Gear God VII!!
episode.summary: As Gao and his friends race to find Batzz, Kanata faces Wisdom and his new Flag card, the Chaos. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ウィズダムの恐るべき陰謀! 怒れバッツ!!
Wisdom`s Terrifying Conspiracy! Rage, Batzz!
Wisdom no Osorubeki Inbou! Okore Bats!!
episode.summary: Wisdom invites Batzz to join him in world domination as Gao faces him in a Buddyfight. Meanwhile, Gaito corners Sakate and tries to get the truth out of him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激闘の果てに... 牙王死す!!
After the Raging Battle...Gao Perishes!
Gekitou no Hate ni... Kiba-ou Shisu!!
episode.summary: Gao continues his gruelling battle against Wisdom. Tasuku and Ku face off against Brutal and Keisetsu, two members of the Chaos Three, Wisdom`s elite team of Buddyfighters. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: トイレの恐怖! 相棒学園はオバケだらけ!?
Terror from the Toilet! Aibo Academy is Full of Ghosts!
Toilet no Kyoufu! Aibou Gakuen wa Obake Darake!?
episode.summary: A mysterious old man holds the secret to restoring Gao. Gao and his friends investigate a series of spooky events plaguing Aibo Academy. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 牙王 inタスク! 二人で一人の×天バスター!!
Gao in Tasuku! A Two-in-One X Tempest Buster!
Kibaou in Tasuku! Futari de Hitori no x Ten Buster!!
episode.summary: Gao learns that he can possess humans in his current ghost-like form. When Shido grows jealous of Kanata and Gaito`s popularity and concocts a plan, only Gao and his friends can stop him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: タイムリミット! 牙王が消滅する日!!
Time Limit! The Day that Gao Stops Existing!
Time Limit! Kiba-ou ga Shoumetsu Suru Hi!!
episode.summary: Batzz has until sunset to help people and cure Gao`s dragonification. As Gao begins to fade out of existence, Baku discovers that the X Tempest Buster card has gone missing, leading to a desperate search. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天国? 地獄? ぶんぶく師匠とデカたぬき!!
Paradise? Underworld? Master Bunbuku and Giant Tanuki!
Tengoku? Jigoku? Bunbuku Shishou to Deka Tanuki!!
episode.summary: Gao reunites with Master Bunbuku, the mysterious old man who helped him reverse his dragonification. Suzumi senses that there`s more to this stranger than meets the eye. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 合宿スタート! 復活の×天バスター!!
Training Camp Begins! The X Tempest Buster Revives!
Gasshuku Start! Fukkatsu no x Ten Buster!!
episode.summary: Gao and his friends start an intensive week-long training session at Master Bunbuku`s training camp. En route to the camp, mysterious monsters kidnap Master Bunbuku and the others. Gao must overcome his inability to use the X Tempest Buster. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 死神VS死の宣告! 運命の第三ターン!!
Grim Reaper vs. Death Sentence! The Third Turn of Destiny!
Shinigami VS Shi no Senkoku! Unmei no Dai San Turn!!
episode.summary: Guru Bunbuku gives advice to Gao`s friends. As they puzzle over the meaning of this words, Gaito becomes determined to face Kiri in a Buddyfight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: タッグマッチ! すれ違うカナタとアトラ!!
Tag Match! Kanata and Athora`s Crossed Wires!
Tag Match! Surechigau Kanata to Athora!!
episode.summary: Zanya and Tetsuya join the training camp. While Kanata tries to puzzle out the meaning of Guru Bunbuku`s advice, Athora worries about their future as Buddies. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 牙王とバッツ! 星空の誓い!!
Gao and Batzz! The Starry Sky Promise!
Kiba-ou to Batzz! Hoshizora no Chikai!!
episode.summary: As the training camp winds down, Guru Bunbuku reveals the truth about Batzz`s past. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: バッツ逆天! 雷帝フォーメーション完成!!
Batzz`s Overturn! Thunder Empire Formation Complete!
Batzz Gekiten! Kaminaritei Formation Kansei!!
episode.summary: Gao and friends are worried about Kanata`s strange behavior. Chibi Panda wants to become stronger to protect Gao and Batzz. Guru Bunbuku tries to solve both problems through a Buddyfight with Gao. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 逆天殺! 闘技のブルータル!!
Overkill! Brutal of the Martial Arts!
Gyaku Tensatsu! Tougi no Brutal!!
episode.summary: Kiri encounters Brutal while investigating the mysterious disappearance of monsters from various worlds. When Kiri rescues some Chaos Monster cards from Brutal`s clutches, Brutal challenges him to a Buddyfight and shows his true colors. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 誕生! 逆天の黒死竜!!
Birth! Overturn Black Death Dragon Rises!
Tanjou! Gyakuten no Kuro Shiryou!!
episode.summary: Abygale trains desperately in order to evolve further and gain the powers of Overturn. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 師匠VSウィズダム! 衝撃のギアゴッドVIII!!
Guru vs. Wisdom! The Shocking Geargod VIII!
Shishou VS Wisdom! Shougeki no Geargod VIII!
episode.summary: Gao and his friends wander through the maze-like forest as they try to stop Sakate and Keisetsu. Wisdom appears before Guru Bunbuku and tries to destroy the Mirage Card. A Buddyfight ensues. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 集結! 雷帝軍!!
Assemble! Thunder Empire!
Shuuketsu! Kaminari Teigun!!
episode.summary: Gao and Batzz create a new flag card. Chibi Panda decides that Gao needs to get stronger, as Thunder Empire monsters respond to Batzz`s call to arms. Wisdom`s second-in-command, Grimoire, orders Sakate to destroy the new flag card. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 逆天VS逆天殺 放て! ×天アルティメットバスター!!
Overturn versus Overkill! Unleash the X Tempest Ulti-Buster!
Gyakuten VS Gyakutensatsu Hanate! x Ten Ultimate Buster!!
episode.summary: Gao and Sakate have a Buddyfight over the fate of the Thunder Emperor`s Fangs card. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: パパパンダ来襲! さらば, ちびパンダ!!
Invasion of Papa Panda! Farewell, Chibi Panda!
Papa Panda Raishuu! Saraba, Chibi Panda!!
episode.summary: Chibi Panda`s father is determined to take him back to Dragon World. As the Mikado family tries to convince Papa Panda to let his son stay, Gao and Batzz must decide what is truly best for their friend. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 無限斬撃! 降魔王剣レヴァンティン!!
Infinite Slashes! Demonic Descent Sword of the King, Laevateinn!!
Mugen Zangeki! Gouma-ou Ken Laevateinn!!
episode.summary: Gao and Batzz are invited to a ceremonial fight at the newly open Grimoire Park. Kanata and Zanya are suspicious of Keisetsu and investigate. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: パーフェクトスルーファイター! 気毒スルー!!
Perfectly Ignored Fighter! Slide Kidoku!
Perfect Through Fighter! Kidoku Suruu!!
episode.summary: Gao is challenged by a mysterious Buddyfighter who wants to become Wisdom`s right hand man. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 逆天の力! 天晶竜アルドアトラ!!
The Power of Overturn! Heavenly Crystal Dragon, Aldo Athora!
Gyakuten no Chikara! Tenshou Ryuu Aldo Athora!!
episode.summary: Kanata`s past with Keisetsu is revealed. Grimoire hires a mercenary Buddyfighter to represent Grimoire Park. Meanwhile, monsters all over Cho-Tokyo begin to act strangely. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 迫る魔剣! ケイセツの逆天殺!!
The Demonic Sword Draws Near! Keisetsu`s Overkill!
Semaru Maken! Keisetsu no Gyaku Tensatsu!!
episode.summary: Gao and his friends infiltrate Grimoire Park in an attempt to find Wisdom. Keisetsu challenges Kanata to a Buddyfight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ガイトVS人工知能! 爆裂のミニギアゴッド!!
Gaito versus Artificial Intelligence! Explosion of the Mini Geargods!
Gaito vs Jinkou Chinou! Bakuretsu no Mini Gia God!!
episode.summary: Wisdom holds a press conference and announces his plans for Grimoire Park. An enraged Gaito storms into the park and is forced to battle the Mini Geargods. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ケイセツに届け! カナタの新必殺シュート!!
Will it reach Keisetsu? Kanata`s new Impact Shot!
Keisetsu ni Todoke! Kanata no Shin Hissatsu Shoot!!
episode.summary: Gao and his friends pursue Sakate from Grimoire Park to the Chaos Control Company HQ. Kanata must defeat Keisetsu to gain an audience with Wisdom. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Cの超越者! ギアゴッドver. 099 !!
CHAOS Transcendant! Geargod Ver. 099!
C no Chouetsusha! Geargod Ver. 099!!
episode.summary: Gao tries to understand Wisdom`s motivations, but they are unable to overcome their philosophical differences. The only way to settle the issue: a Buddyfight pitting their unique Flags against each other. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ギアゴッドの逆天殺! 追いつめられた牙王!!
Geargod`s Overkill! Gao in Dire Straits!
Geargod no Gyaku Tensatsu! Oitsumerareta Kiba-ou!!
episode.summary: Gao faces Wisdom in a Buddyfight, but things take an unexpected turn when Geargod ver. 099`s Overkill is unleashed. Gao and his friends must flee when Geargod runs wild. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 掴め! 逆天を超える力!!
Grasp it! The Power Beyond Overturn!!
Tsukame! Gekiten o Koeru Chikara!!
episode.summary: Gao and his friends visit Guru Bunbuku, hoping for a training session. Keisetsu faces Wisdom in a Buddyfight that tests not only Geargod 099, but also Keisetsu`s relationship with Wisdom. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 友情の雷帝軍 ギアゴッド反乱!?
Thunder Empire of Friendship! Geargod Rebels?!
Yuujou no Kaminari Teigun Geargod Hanran!?
episode.summary: When Gao struggles to find a way to defeat Wisdom, Kiri tries to reignite his passion for Buddyfight by challenging him to a match. Meanwhile, Geargod and Wisdom clash over their attitudes towards Buddyfight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新たなバディ! 機械じかけの太陽番長!!
A New Buddy! The Clockwork Mighty Sun Fighter!!
Arata na Buddy! Kikaiji Kake no Taiyou Banchou!!
episode.summary: Zanya reveals the results of his investigation into the Chaos Company. Geargod 099 sends a duplicate of Gao to infiltrate his home and school, resulting in an attack on Student Council President Shido. Shido challenges Gao to a Buddyfight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 牙王VSカオス牙王! 機神フォーメーション完成!!
Gao versus CHAOS Gao! Autodeity Formation Complete!
Kibaou VS Chaos Kibaou! Hatagami Formation Kansei!!
episode.summary: Gao and Batzz struggle against CHAOS Gao`s Autodeity Army, which is made up of evil duplicates of the Thunder Empire cards. Batzz begins to have doubts about his own abilities. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: バディ解散! さらばバッツ!!
Buddy Breakup! Farewell, Batzz!
Buddy Kaisan! Saraba Batzz!!
episode.summary: Gao and Chibi Panda notice Batzz acting strangely. Meanwhile, Ku and Satsuki investigate Grimoire`s activities. Grimoire reveals a surprising new side to himself and challenges Ku to a Buddyfight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 轟天覇王竜! バールバッツ・ドラグロイヤー!!
Turbulent Warlord Dragon! Barlbatzz Dragoroyale!
Gouten Haou Ryuu! Barlbatzz Dragoroyale!!
episode.summary: Gao and Chibi Panda search for Batzz. Batzz returns to Dragon World and asks Saint Glory Sword Dragon to seal him away in the same shrine where Gao first found him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 見よ! これがバッツの大逆天だ!!
Behold! This is Batzz`s Overthrow!
Miyo! Kore ga Batzz no Daigyaku Tenda!!
episode.summary: CHAOS Gao and Geargod 099 begin chaosifying the monsters of Dragon World. Gao and Batzz challenge them to a Buddyfight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 都市伝説ロボ? ハナコWC降臨!!
Robo of Urban Legends? Hanako WC Appears!
Toshi Densetsu Robo? Hanako WC Kourin!!
episode.summary: Batzz is eager to show off his new evolved form in a Buddyfight, but first Gao and his friends must deal with Hanako, a monster who has returned to haunt the boys` bathroom. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 輝け! 逆天星竜ジャックナイフ!!
Shine Bright! Shining Dragoner, Jackknife!
Kagayake! Gyaku Takashi Seiryuu Jacknife!
episode.summary: Tasuku and Gao attempt to find and capture Geargod before Wisdom can use his hacking skills to take over its mind. Grimoire stands in Tasuku`s way, while Gao has his hands full explaining the nature of true Buddies to Geargod. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 神を超える力! 究極に至るカオス!!
The Power that Surpasses Deities! The Ultimate Chaos!
Kami o Koeru Chikara! Kyuukyoku ni Itaru Chaos!!
episode.summary: Guru Bunbuku reveals Geargod`s secret origins. Grimoire and Wisdom face off in a Buddyfight, with the future of the Wisdom clan at stake. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 牙王VSケイセツ! 帰ってきたカオススリー!!
Gao versus Keisetsu! Return of the Chaos Three!
Gao VS Keisetsu! Kaette Kita Chaos Three!!
episode.summary: Wisdom instructs the Chaos Three to destroy Gao and Batzz. Armed with a powerful new card, Keisetsu challenges Gao to a Buddyfight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ウィズダムの野望! 恐怖のアップグレード宣言!!
Wisdom`s Ambition! The Terrifying Upgrade Declaration!
Wisdom no Yabaou! Kyoufu no Upgrade Sengen!!
episode.summary: As monsters rampage throughout Cho-Tokyo, Wisdom announces his plans to upgrade the world through Chaosification of all monsters. Keisetsu offers to lead Gao and company to Wisdom, but Brutal of the Martial Arts stands in their way. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最終計画始動! カオス化する世界!!
Final Plan Activated! New World Chaos!
Saishuu Keikaku Shidou! Chaos Suru Sekai!!
episode.summary: Kiri leads a team of heroes trying to slow down the Chaosification of the remaining worlds. Meanwhile, Gao and his friends search for Chibi Panda, and Kanata faces Sakate in a Buddyfight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最終決戦! 牙王VSウィズダム!!
Final Battle! Gao versus Wisdom!
Saishuu Kessen! Gao VS Wisdom!!
episode.summary: Gao and his friends follow Wisdom to the former site of the Mirage Shrine, where Gao challenges Wisdom to a Buddyfight match. It`s all-out war between the Chaos monsters and Thunder Empire! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 勝て牙王! 最後のバディファイト!!
Win, Gao! The Last Buddyfight!
Kate Gao! Saigo no Buddyfight!!
episode.summary: Gao and Wisdom pull out all the stops as they battle over the fate of the parallel worlds. New cards and new abilities are revealed as the Buddyfight comes to a thrilling conclusion. Source: crunchyroll
